EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Email Confirm - DC
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - DC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in DC. Please find the event details below:
Date: Wednesday, November 5, 2014 Time: Session #1 begins @ 8:00AM/Session #2 begins @ 11:45 AM/Session #3 begins @ 2:45PM/Session #4 begins @ 4:15PM Location: Venue coming soon! We will email you location specifics once we have secured a venue.
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
